data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Surrounding the lakes and extending northwest of them along the rift valley to the Golfo de Fonseca are fertile lowland plains highly enriched with volcanic ash from nearby volcanoes. These ____ are ____ populated ____ well ____. More ____ west ____ the ____ region ____ a ____ line ____ ash-covered ____ and ____ that ____ the ____ from ____ Pacific Ocean. This line is highest in the central portion near the cities of León and Managua.

This line is highest in the central portion near the cities of León and Managua.
data.answer: 围绕着这些湖泊，沿着裂谷向西北延伸到丰塞卡高尔夫，是肥沃的低地平原，富含附近火山喷发的火山灰。这些低地人口密集，耕种良好。在湖区更直接的西边是一条狭窄的被火山灰覆盖的山丘和火山线，它将湖区与太平洋隔开。这条线在靠近León和马那瓜的中部地区最高。
